description:
Kurokan`s decison has casued negative reactions from school authority and team players. The Support Association and Almuni Club form an alliance in order to kick Kurokan out of Kirono High. The team players are also split into two groups where most of them are against Kurokan. Morioka finally understands Kurokan`s plan for Masamiya, but how will Kurokan win the Fall Championships?
Source: crunchyroll
